title: FACE PC Mystery Tech!

The Revolution Toaster on Amazon:  The mini dinosaur...thing on Amazon:  The weird magnifying smartphone screen on Amazon:  The Furby Boom on Amazon:  The Kinesis Advantage2 ergonomic keyboard on Amazon:  The Vufine wearable display on Amazon:   Follow Ken on Twitch:   By using our Amazon affiliate links we may receive compensation for purchases through those links.  My new podcast The Test Drivers!  Our second channel @thisis!  I stream on Twitch now!  We have a new Discord:  Subscribe!  Instagram:  Twitter:
